name: Pirate Cribbage
description:
LIMITED TIME BONUS. Play The Pirate for free, no need for an in-app purchase.

Arrg matey. PIRATE CRIBBAGE is a game for brave souls who take great risks for high rewards. Draw 5 cards and distribute any or all of them to set of three hands. Draw as many times as you like but your total score must increase each turn or you forfeit your turn and your booty.

Play against the Parrot or the skilled Pirate. You can even play against your so-called friends using pass-and-play.
